synopsis.text: Eiffel, a resident of the extraordinary Happiness House, has fallen head over heels for a charming poodle. To assist his lovestruck friend, Nanami-chan, an exuberant creature hatched from a peculiar nut, embarks on a heartwarming mission to unite the two. Meanwhile, Michi, Nanami's human companion, explores the wonders of her new home nestled within a colossal tree adorned with delightful dwellings. Together with her family, Michi forms unbreakable bonds with the whimsical inhabitants of the Happiness House, sharing joyful moments and overcoming challenges as they learn the true essence of friendship and community.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
